Link list

Use a link list to display similar items as a list to the user. Each item in the list links to another page.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-link-list

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-link-list

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-link-list/src/scss/link-list";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Link list

Link list with icon before the text. The icon can be changed.

  • Bouwen, wonen en energie
  • Mobiliteit en openbare werken 
      
  <ul class="vl-link-list"><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Bouwen, wonen en energie
    </a>
</li><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Mobiliteit en openbare werken
    </a>
</li></ul>

Link list small

Apply the vl-link-list--small class modifier to decrease the text size.

  • Bouwen, wonen en energie
  • Mobiliteit en openbare werken 
      
  <ul class="vl-link-list vl-link-list--small"><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Bouwen, wonen en energie
    </a>
</li><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Mobiliteit en openbare werken
    </a>
</li></ul>

Link list inline

Apply the vl-link-list--inline class modifier to show the links next to each other.

  • Bouwen, wonen en energie
  • Mobiliteit en openbare werken
  • Bouwen, wonen en energie
  • Mobiliteit en openbare werken 
      
  <ul class="vl-link-list vl-link-list--small"><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Bouwen, wonen en energie
    </a>
</li><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Mobiliteit en openbare werken
    </a>
</li></ul>

Link list spotlight

Link list containing one spotlight item and multiple link items.

  • Premies voor renovatie

    Gaat u uw woning renoveren of verbouwen? Bekijk hier de premies.
  • Bouwen, wonen en energie
  • Mobiliteit en openbare werken 
      
  <ul class="vl-link-list"><li class="vl-link-list__item">
<a href="#" class="vl-spotlight">
  <article role="none">
      <header role="none" class="vl-spotlight__header">
        <div class="vl-spotlight__image vl-spotlight__image--focus-center-center">
          <img class="vl-spotlight__image__img" src="https://picsum.photos/600?image=821" alt="spotlight image">
        </div>
        <div class="vl-spotlight__title-wrapper">
          <h3 class="vl-spotlight__title">Premies voor renovatie</h3>
        </div>
      </header>
      <p class="vl-spotlight__text">Gaat u uw woning renoveren of verbouwen? Bekijk hier de premies.</p>
    </article>
</a>
</li><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Bouwen, wonen en energie
    </a>
</li><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Mobiliteit en openbare werken
    </a>
</li></ul>

Link list spotlight bordered

Apply the .vl-link-list--bordered class modifier to add a border to your link list. You can overwrite the border styling per element with the following modifier

  • Premies voor renovatie

    Gaat u uw woning renoveren of verbouwen? Bekijk hier de premies.
  • Bouwen, wonen en energie
  • Mobiliteit en openbare werken 
      
  <ul class="vl-link-list vl-link-list--bordered"><li class="vl-link-list__item">
<a href="#" class="vl-spotlight">
  <article role="none">
      <header role="none" class="vl-spotlight__header">
        <div class="vl-spotlight__image vl-spotlight__image--focus-center-center">
          <img class="vl-spotlight__image__img" src="https://picsum.photos/600?image=821" alt="spotlight image">
        </div>
        <div class="vl-spotlight__title-wrapper">
          <h3 class="vl-spotlight__title">Premies voor renovatie</h3>
        </div>
      </header>
      <p class="vl-spotlight__text">Gaat u uw woning renoveren of verbouwen? Bekijk hier de premies.</p>
    </article>
</a>
</li><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Bouwen, wonen en energie
    </a>
</li><li class="vl-link-list__item"><a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Mobiliteit en openbare werken
    </a>
</li></ul>

Accessibility

All informative images must have an alt text that describes the image. This allows users with a screenreader to access information about the image. Purely decorative images can have an empty alt attribute (alt="").
